node.title: Lonza
node.content:
Lonza

A Global Leader in Life Science

Lonza is one of the worldâ€™s leading and most-trusted suppliers to the pharmaceutical, biotech and specialty ingredients markets. As an integrated solutions provider, Lonza is boosting its value creation along and beyond the healthcare continuum with a strong focus on patient healthcare, consumer preventive healthcare and consumer's healthy environment.Â 

Featured Products

LactoPro CLP

LactoPro CLP is an advanced nutrient complex which contains Lactobacillus, milk solids and soybean oil.

NABÂ® Rhodiola Extract

NABÂ® Rhodiola Extract is an extract from the root Rhodiola rosea, which originates from the Arctic regions of Eastern Siberia and the Tibetan mountains.

MetabioticsÂ® Resveratrol ECT GEO

MetabioticsÂ® Resveratrol is a unique multi-functional active resulting from the fermentation of Resveratrol with Pichia pastoris.

Lonza Business Groups

lonza business

Personal Care

Find Ingredients

Discover how we advance the well-being of people around the world by helping our customers create the world's leading health, wellness and beauty products.

The Personal Care business of Lonza Consumer Care is driven by the following philosophy:Â 
Inspire the Formulator... Excite the Consumer... Â®

Lonzaâ€™s history of supplying quality products to the agricultural sector
can be traced back to our founding in the Swiss Alps in 1897. Ever since
then we have striven to provide innovative and quality products to our
partners around the world.

A portfolio of products designed to help
optimize crop protection formulations and help farmers deliver safe and abundant crops.

lonza business

Agro Ingredients

Visit Lonza.com

Agro Ingredients

Offering versatile actives through established customer relations, as well as expertise in biocides technologies and regulatory environment.

Agro Ingredients

State-of-the-art herbicides, fungicides and bio-derived products among many other important ingredients for the modern food supply. Coming Soon to Knowde

node.title: Lonza Personal Care
node.content:
PErsonal Care

From Lonza

To inspire global formulators to create robust formulations through preservation systemsÂ 
based on world-leading microbiology capabilities and formulation essentials
that help enhance the appearance and functionality of the final product.Â Â 

about

The Personal Care business of Lonza Consumer Care is driven by the following philosophy:Â Â Inspire the Formulator... Excite the Consumer... Â®

We look to Inspire the Formulator with a portfolio of functional solutions allowing formulators to act on new ideas and solve difficult formulating challenges.

node.title: Amphoterge
node.content:
Amphoterge

From Lonza

High Foaming Surfactants

These high foaming surfactants can be easily used in a broad number of personal care applications where mildness, foaming and compatibility are important

Key Benefits

  • High Foaming
  • Mild on skin and eyes
  • High electrolyte tolerance
  • Compatible with other surfactants

node.title: Biocell
node.content:
Biocell SOD

From Lonza

Skin Smoothing

Provides skin with smoothing benefits, environmental protection and antioxidant effects; is a scalpceutical and also offers hair color protection.

Key Benefits

  • Reduces UV-induced erythema
  • Protects against lipid peroxidation - neutralizes the superoxide radical
  • Protects against damaging effects of the environment
  • Enhances protective effects of suncare products
  • Combats photoaging

node.title: Carnipure
node.content:
Carnipure™

From Lonza

Energy Renewal for Scalp, Skin and Hair

Carnitine is naturally produced in the body and has also been used in health and nutrition for decades for muscle development, energy boosting, and heart and brain function.3 Research studies in vitro suggest that Carnitineâ€™s role at the cellular level may also provide benefits to skin and hair.

Key Benefits

  • Internal/External uses
  • Increases epidermal turnover
  • Maintains healthy skin hydration levels

node.title: Carsoquat
node.content:
CarsoquatÂ®

From Lonza

Untangling the Shine & Glide From Your Formulations

A versatile range ofÂ  conditioners that may be incorporated into rinses, hair conditioners, treatments and shaving products to improve shine, glide and detangling. These are low-foaming ingredients that can be easily combined with other actives. They are a cost-effective choice for your hair care formulations.

Key Benefits

  • Low-foaming
  • Shine
  • Glide
  • De-tangling

node.title: Chronosphere
node.content:
Chronosphere Â® Light-Controlling Spherical Powders

From Lonza

Novel Light Manipulation Offering Anti-Aging Benefits

Light controlling spherical powder which obscures skin imperfections; hides fine lines/wrinkles offering the illusion of surface smoothness; provides a luminescent appearance to skin.

Key Benefits

  • Light controlling spherical powder
  • Obscuring skin imperfections
  • Minimizing fine lines/wrinkles
  • Illusion of surface smoothness
  • Luminescent appearance

node.title: Cosmocil
node.content:
CosmocilÂ® Preservatives

From Lonza

Fast-Acting and Trusted Antibacterial

CosmocilÂ® broad spectrum, fast-acting antibacterials are effective preservatives for personal care formulations and active against a wide range of both Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.

Key Benefits

  • Clear, colorless, highly water-soluble
  • Fast-acting and strong antibacterial efficacy
  • High activity vs. tough Gram (negative) organisms e.g.
  • Pseudomonas
  • Chemically stable and non-volatile
  • Zero VOC
  • Effective and stable over a broad pH range (3-10)
  • UV stable
  • Odorless and non-foaming
  • Broad global acceptance
  • Non-sticky feel on the skin

node.title: Glydant
node.content:
Glydant Â® Preservatives

From Lonza

Excellent Antibacterial for Product Protection

GlydantÂ® is a preservative system that acts as an effective antibacterial.
This DMDM Hydantoin chemistry has been used safely and effectively
for years within personal care. GlydantÂ® works well in most cosmetic
formulations and can be used at low use levels. For added ease of use,
GlydantÂ® is offered in a liquid format. In addition, there are strong safety
and toxicological packages supporting this material.

Key Benefits

  • Excellent antibacterial, mild antifungal
  • Extremely cost-effective
  • Formulation flexibility
  • Water-white/color stability
  • Compatibility with anionics, nonionics and cationics
  • Heat stability
  • Water solubility
  • Has a wide range of global regulatory approval

node.title: Mikrokill
node.content:
MikrokillÂ®

Broad Spectrum Preservative System

MikrokillÂ® Preservatives unique and trusted

MikrokillÂ®Â Preservatives are a unique and trusted combination of three well-accepted personal care components in phenoxyethanol, chlorphenesin and caprylyl glycol, providing exceptional broad spectrum protection of many personal care products encompassing skin care, hair care and sun care systems.

Key Product Benefits

  • Safe and effective
  • Highly effective antimicrobial
  • Broad spectrum activity on bacteria, yeast and mold
  • Has a wide range of global regulatory acceptance
  • Can be used alone or in combination with other preservatives
  • Stable in the usual operating range for Personal Care products (pH 3-8)
  • Compatible in a wide range of skin care, hair care and sun care systems
  • Low odor profile
  • Not tested on animals
  • Liquid for ease of use
  • Well documented safety profile
  • Patented formula (US Patent No. US7854940)

We look to Inspire the Formulator with a portfolio of functional solutions allowing formulators to act on new ideas and solve difficult formulating challenges.<\/p>","section_style":"","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":"20"},"_section_style":"","_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"26","right":"0","bottom":"40","left":"0","isLinked":false},"_section_background":"","_box_shadow_box_shadow":{"horizontal":0,"vertical":0,"blur":10,"spread":0,"inset":"","color":"rgba(0,0,0,0.5)"},"_section_responsive":"","responsive_description":"","section_custom_css_pro":"","custom_css_pro":""},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"63f05b0a","elType":"widget","settings":{"text":"Learn more ","effect":"btn-effect-6","icon":"fa fa-angle-right","icon_align":"right","icon_indent":{"unit":"px","size":10},"typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":14},"typography_text_transform":"uppercase","typography_letter_spacing":{"unit":"px","size":1},"button_background_hover_color":"#d6ae4c","hover_color":"#ffffff","border_border":"solid","border_width":{"unit":"px","top":"1","right":"1","bottom":"1","left":"1","isLinked":true},"border_color":"#eaeaea","text_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"12","right":"28","bottom":"12","left":"28","isLinked":false},"text_padding_mobile":{"unit":"px","top":"12","right":"20","bottom":"12","left":"20","isLinked":false}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"oew-button-effects"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

node.title: GlydantÂ® 2000
node.content:
Key Attributes

  • Low Free Formaldehyde (0.09% max.)
  • Excellent bactericide, mild fungicide
  • Water-White Clarity
  • Maximum Cost-Effective Preservation
  • No Crystallization Problems
  • Color Stability in Formulations
  • Comprehensive Toxicology Package
  • Has a wide range of global regulatory approval

Compositional Breakdown

Challenge Test Data in Protein Shampoo

Efficacy

Microbiological Challenge Studies Studies were run using various concentrations of GlydantÂ® 2000 in various formulations to see efficacy on a mixed inoculum of bacteria and mixed fungi. All samples were inoculated at the beginning of the study, sampled at 24 hours, 3, 7, 14, 21 and 28 days.

Formulation Recommendations

  • Wide pH range: 3â€“10
  • Compatible with anionic, cationic and nonionic systems
  • Add during cool down phase of process, where possible
  • Short bursts of temperature are also acceptable, up to 80Â°C, in closed system

Global Regulatory

Europe

  • Listed in Annex V to Regulation EC/1223/2009
  • Finished products containing DMDMH must be labeled with the
  • warning â€œcontains formaldehydeâ€ if the (free) formaldehyde
  • concentration exceeds 0.05%
  • Maximum concentration 0.6% DMDMH

Japan

  • Listed in the positive list
  • The following warning must be labeled: â€œshould not be used by
  • infants or by people who are hypersensitive to formaldehyde.â€
  • Can be used at a level up to 0.3% DMDMH for rinse-off only
  • Not permitted in oral products

United States

  • Approved by CTFA for both rinse-off and leave-on applications;
  • can be used at a level up to 0.6% DMDMH
  • General
  • Not for use in oral and lip products
